trending.title: Decoupled DMD: CFG Augmentation as the Spear, Distribution Matching as the Shield
trending.abstract: Submitted by Cxxs  The study reveals that in text-to-image generation, CFG Augmentation is the primary driver of few-step distillation in Distribution Matching Distillation (DMD), while the distribution matching term acts as a regularizer.
